Game information:  


The game is set among the locations of the fictional world of soaring in the sky,
called Cocoon, whose government, Sanctum, sends down its citizens suspected in
connection with a pulse, a big scary world below. Female soldier codenamed Lightning
throws a challenge to the authorities, and fought with them in order to save his
sister, who was elected by the gods pulse and became an enemy of Cocoon. Soon to
join her other characters, and they all become the same elected to perform some
unknown purpose. Heroes confront Sanctum, trying to figure out its purpose, in
the case of the task they turn into crystals and will gain eternal life in the
event of failure - will be terrible monsters.


RePack Features:  

FINAL FANTASY XIII
Do not cut / recoded
Ability to download only the desired language
(data_en * .bin, video_en * .bin - English |
data_jap * .bin, video_jap * .bin - Japanese)
